岋字的基本解释

岋
è
摇动：“天动地岋。”

岋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［è］
［《集韻》鄂合切，入合，疑。］
摇动貌；摇动。

岋字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　岋； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页308第17
【集韻】鄂合切，音砐。動貌。【揚雄·校獵賦】天動地岋。或从土作圾。【莊子·天地篇】殆哉圾乎。

岋字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
岋字的起名意思

暂无。

è
Shaking: "The sky is moving and the earth is moving."

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [è]
["Jiyun" The jaw is cut, enters, and suspicious. ]
Shake the appearance; shake.
岋
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　岋; Kangxi Strokes: 7; Page Number: Page 308-17
【Jiyun】The jaw is cut together, and the sound is 砐. Dynamic appearance. [Yang Xiong·School Hunting Fu] Heaven is moving and earth is moving. Or make rubbish from the soil. [Zhuangzi·Heaven and Earth Chapter] It's a trash.
